name: Barb & Betty
description:
Two grannies get in a fight in our local multiplayer GMTK 2018 jam entry: [Beat 'em up] without [meelee combat].

There has to be at least one controller connected for the game to work.

Barbara and Betty have known each other for many, many years - but with their upcoming "Cheerleaders of '52" reunion, old conflicts resurface. This is a GMTK Jam 2018 entry with the theme [Beat 'em up] without [meele combat]. A 2 player local multiplayer game created within 48 hours.

Recommended: use two controllers.

Made by Jens Bahr (programming) and Marc Glasze (art).

-

Disclaimer: we did not create the music and sound used in the game.  Music source, Cat sound source, Glass break source, Applause sound source, Evil laugh source.
